content: **willow leg warmers ** ======================================= these easy crochet leg warmers are super cozy and so quick to work up this free pattern is written for 8 sizes from baby up to adult large so you can whip up a pair of crochet leg warmers for everyone in your family each leg warmer is a simple rectangle which is worked flat in one piece and then seamed to form a tube the main body of the leg warmer is a combination of half_double_crochet half_double_crochet and slip stitches slip_stitch which creates a fun ribbed texture and the ribbing at the top and bottom has the most satisfying knit/purl look **sizes to fit calf circumference ** baby 6 5″ / 16 5cm toddler 7 5″ / 19cm child 3-5 8 5″ / 21 5cm child 6-10 9 5″ / 24cm adult x-small 13″ / 33cm adult small 14″ / 35 5cm adult med 16″ / 40 5cm adult large 18″ / 45 5cm *the pattern includes instructions for how to adjust the sizing * **yarn requirements per pair** baby 88 yds / 80m toddler 128 yds / 118m child 3-5 190 yds / 174m child 6-10 242 yds / 222m adult x-small 384 yds / 352m adult small 440 yds / 402m adult med 568 yds / 520m adult large 690 yds / 630m --- **join my newsletter **
